Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Golden Dolphin Way, east of Overland Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive intersects Golden Dolphin Way to the west. The City Wall is still visible (as if you could miss it) on the south side of the road. On the north side of the road are the numerous, individual houses of the farmers and their families. The individual houses were built to provide easier access to the farms, where they would be working.
